entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:46 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 7:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: S 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
